importantDates.descriptionOfWhyDateIsRelevant: Su Yiming won a gold medal at the Beijing Winter Olympics just days before turning 18, marking a pivotal moment in his career and public recognition.

importantTimeframes.descriptionOfWhyTimeFrameIsRelevant: Su Yiming is preparing for his second Winter Olympics in Italy, which will take place in early 2028, making this timeframe critical to his athletic and public profile.

keyTakeAways: Su Yiming transitioned from a child actor to a global snowboarding superstar, winning gold at the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics.
His rise was influenced by family background in snowboarding and a deep personal connection to the sport.
After winning Olympic medals, he took a year and a half off to recharge mentally and physically, emphasizing the importance of rest and balance in elite sports.
Su is now a prominent figure in global sports and pop culture, with strong social media presence and brand partnerships.
He maintains a grounded lifestyle, engaging in nature-based activities like fishing, surfing, and playing pool to stay balanced and connected to his roots.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Su Yiming, a Chinese snowboarder and former child actor, won a gold medal in men’s big air at the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympics, launching a meteoric rise to global fame. His early fame came from a role in the film 'The Taking of Tiger Mountain,' and he transitioned to professional snowboarding in 2018. After winning a silver and then gold at his home Games, he took a year and a half off to recover mentally and physically, recognizing the emptiness that follows major success. He returned with renewed focus and motivation, now preparing for the 2028 Winter Olympics in Italy. Su maintains a grounded lifestyle, engaging in nature-based activities and balancing his career with personal time, while maintaining a strong global presence on social media. His journey reflects both the challenges and triumphs of elite young athletes in sports and pop culture.
title: From child actor to Olympic champion: Meet snowboarding superstar Su Yiming
